pageContent: Purpose: To comprehensively explore the role of a prostate cancer diagnosis and its treatment to several outcomes including diet, Hemoglobin A1c, and weight status, in a large, nationally representative, cross-sectional study.

metaData.source:
Is a visible (hypoechoic) lesion at biopsy an independent predictor of prostate cancer outcome?
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/22920545/
